value:
$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|Just one glimpse of your dazzling
visage has struck me nearly blind!$k$pWhy don't you tell me about
yourself? We can go talk under
the shade of the palms...$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Sorry. I'm...busy.$k$p$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|Dang. Another one gone.$k$p$WmMPID_水着イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Swim20,Face|Of course I'd find you chasing after
girls, Sylvain.$k$pCan't you give it a rest for once?$k$p$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|Ingrid, look around you...$k$pSee all these charming ladies, out for
an adventure in the tropics? It'd be
rude of me not to provide!$k$p$WmMPID_水着イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Swim20,Face|Don't try to weasel your way out of
this. Everyone here is a Hero called
to this world by the summoner.$k$pSo everything we do reflects back
on the summoner too. You...do
understand that, don't you?$k$p$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|Speaking of reflecting...I do wish
we could bring His Majesty here.$k$pI just want to see his reaction,
don't you? ...Do boars like to
swim, you think?$k$p$WmMPID_水着イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Swim20,Face|Sylvain!$k$p$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|It was a joke! A JOKE! I'm not Felix...
But I do wish they were here too.
His Highness and Felix, I mean.$k$pThe sight of the shimmering waves
would be good for them.$k$p$WmMPID_水着イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Swim20,Face|I would like that too.$k$p$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|Well, it's not like we can summon
them ourselves, so...I'm going to
focus on enjoying the time we have!$k$pI'm going to go splash around
in the surf for a while!$k$p$WmMPID_水着イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Swim20,Face|I... Hm. He weaseled his way out.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_水着ローレンツ,ch17_20_Lorenz_M_Swim20,Face|Hello, Ingrid. Something troubling
you? You are welcome to talk to me
if you so desire.$k$pPerhaps we could...share a drink
on the beach...$k$p$WmMPID_水着イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Swim20,Face|Keep it moving, Lorenz. I have
enough headaches as it is.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着ローレンツ,ch17_20_Lorenz_M_Swim20,Face|How could we have lost?! Ah, I know.
It must be that we lack the proper
team chemistry.$k$pPerhaps we should debrief and
strategize over dinner. How would
that sound, Ingrid?$k$p...Ingrid? Where'd she go?$k$p$Sbs150|
